EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Pending orders to be delivered (1560797920.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Pending orders to be delivered (1560797920.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Loretta,
I hope all is well. I tried calling but the automated attendant kept looping me back into the directory when I pressed zero to leave a message. I have my warehouse asking when they can deliver the following orders:
012278 00 016140 00 017157 00 018824 00 020438 00 025201 00 032821 00 931471 00 941969 00 975634 00 977321 00 986453 00 017158-00 012279-00 986455-00 988454-00
Please advise if you require delivery as they are available or do you need these to be delivered altogether. Thank you and have a good one.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
